description: The standard a2 script module collection.
name: a2.modules
news:
* ExplorerHotkeys: Huge Update. Ported many things.
* getWinfo:
  - new menu option to get x|y|w|h into clipboard
  - Added commandline info (if any)
* WinR: now unquotes paths and has new option to always show in explorer
* ExplorerCreateFile: added pasting images from clipboard
* NEW module TaskbarRaiser
